system.description:
You have incorporated the very building blocks of reality into your inherent magical substance. You move, but remain unmoved if you do not wish to be. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as sorcerer levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3cccwpqerr3v215w]{Evolving Manifestation} feature.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as sorcerer levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q3gqqfr37rumjbf6]{Rapturous Presence} feature.
  • Your sorcerer levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.rx1wvajk4j70trgb]{Bind Elemental} feature.
  • You are immune to any effect that would move you against your will.
